definitions.definition: a combination of statements, ideas, or features of a situation that are opposed to one another.
examples: the proposed new system suffers from a set of internal contradictions

definitions.definition: a person, thing, or situation in which inconsistent elements are present.
examples: the paradox of using force to overcome force is a real contradiction

definitions.definition: the statement of a position opposite to one already made.
examples: the second sentence appears to be in flat contradiction of the first
